Sentencas: In this work, dynamic modelling of a system based on a reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC) is developed so that it can be integrated with the grid for power balancing.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: The focus of this work is on the dynamic operation of a system, which is investigated using representative profiles of wind electricity production.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: In addition, the effect and challenges of dynamic operation on the system and stack itself are studied.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: Detailed operation strategies are defined during the switching process from one operational mode to another and are implemented on the dynamic process model.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: Simulation results show that when the rSOC system is operated in solid oxide electrolysis (SOE) and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) modes alternatively, energy balancing can be implemented on a continuous basis.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: In this process, the results show that the rSOC system operates in a safe operating range and does not deviate from the pre-defined limits.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: This is due to the accurate strategies developed for the switching process.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: It is also observed from the simulation results that the switching time is significantly influenced by the initial power of the first and the final power of the later operational mode.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications

Sentencas: The proposed model of rSOC was validated using experimental data, and good agreement with experimental data was demonstrated.
Titulo: Dynamic modelling of reversible solid oxide cells for grid stabilization applications
